title: Promise to Keep
description: I knew running from Adrian wouldn't be easy. That there was a risk I would be caught, but I never anticipated he would go to such great lengths to find me. Now that he knows what I've done I wonder if there will ever be love between us again, or if we were always meant to be enemies?**This is book two in a duet and CANNOT be read as a standalone. Book 1 Vow to Protect must be read before this one.**
author: J.L. Beck
